content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1644935690227{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(https://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/bigstock-Tools-For-Broadcasting-For-Pod-423598394.jpg?id=6605) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

ATR Podcast Network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1536951581000{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Since ATR opened its doors in 1988, we have been building relationships and fostering deep connections with our clients, contractors, internal staff, and local markets. We are taking those connections one step further with not one but three ATR podcasts. From leadership to working parents to diversity, we want to create spaces to have timely conversations that address many topics of our day. Below is a brief synopsis of each.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”6634″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

Unicorn in the Boardroom

 

Andrea Brenholz is reinventing what it looks like to be a leader. As the CEO and President of ATR International, her goal is to take the legacy her parents built and infuse it with fresh ideas, compassion, and resilience. Driven by a philanthropic spirit, she is passionate about being a voice for dreamers: the women, minorities, and people who are striving to reach greater potential. In each episode, she offers inspiration for the next generation of women in tech through actionable insight that focuses on the unique challenges minorities face. At the end of the day, she boldly believes that becoming a brilliant leader depends upon building a life you love.

 

Listen to the Podcast

 

Check out the Podcast on YouTube

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”6994″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

Parent. Boss. Leader.

 

Parent. Boss. Leader. is a podcast for professionals and working parents who want to build their careers while maintaining a healthy work-life balance. Laura Munson, VP of Sales & Strategy at ATR International, leads the national sales team and offers strategic partnerships to client companies. She knows all too well that the staffing industry is fast-paced and requires strong business acumen, but most importantly, it offers the gift of changing people’s lives. In each episode, she shares leadership insights and experiences that deal with everyday issues and trends affecting leaders across industries.

 

Listen to the Podcast

 

Check out the Podcast on YouTube

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Looking for more insights? Head over to our blog.

Check Out Our Blog

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Latest news and activity

How Can AI Drive Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the Recruitment Process?

02.29.2024 | Artificial Intelligence, Diversity

Can AI-powered recruiting tools transform your workforce? While only 25% of organizations use artificial intelligence for HR-related activities, mainly to save time and money, this revolutionary technology can serve an even greater purpose—beyond generating job descriptions and streamlining workflows.  AI has the power to diversify your candidate base and drive unbiased decision-making throughout the hiring […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • ATR understands the high standards we require and their thorough screening process, large network, and experienced recruiters are able to consistently find the people we need.

     

    -ATR Client

  • When I need staffing services, I call ATR. They never fail to deliver results. They are reliable, professional, ethical, and know their business well.

     

    – ATR Client

  • We have found ATR to be a great business partner. They are professional, knowledgeable, honest, and hardworking. They demonstrate their commitment to quality and great client service every day in large and small ways. 

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row]
